tool_description:
An API showing climate change data.

Based off the tutorial by Code with Ania Kubów
name: The-Climate-Change-News
title: The-Climate-Change-News

api_list.name: Get All Supported News Sources
api_list.description: Returns the list of currently supported news sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/supported"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/supported"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News Articles For A Supported Source
api_list.description: Retrieves the latest news articles from a reputable source relating to climate change.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://the-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/thetimes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://the-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "the-climate-change-news.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
